explanation: [0-0] In a room with wooden flooring and white curtains, a man in a blue court dress and a long white wig stands on the left side of the frame with his mouth open. He holds two crowns in his left hand and one on his head. Behind him, on the floor, stands a woman on tiptoe, arms outstretched in preparation for a jump. She wears a blue top, a purple ballet tutu, and a crown headdress, her eyes closed. A small, round beige sofa sits behind the woman. At the top of the frame, there's a white banner with black subtitles. A crying-laughing emoji follows the subtitles, preceded by a small, circular profile picture.

[0-2] As music begins, the man in the white wig starts talking, moving his hands up and down to the rhythm. Simultaneously, the woman in the tutu performs a dance move, then circles her arms above her head and gracefully spins on her right foot.

[0-2] As music begins, the man in the white wig starts talking, moving his hands up and down to the rhythm. Simultaneously, the woman in the tutu performs a dance move, then circles her arms above her head and gracefully spins on her right foot.

[2-8] The woman in the tutu stops spinning, screams loudly with both feet planted, and looks excitedly at the man in the white wig. Upon hearing the scream, the man abruptly turns to face her. He then looks back towards the front of the frame, laughing. The woman also laughs, looking forward as she bends and walks to the right, her upper body leaving the frame. The man in the white wig, now excitedly moving his body, looks towards the front and leans back, bending his knees and stretching his arms behind him.
